message: Let's make a deal. I take $9,000, you take $1,000.  The money will be worth less with each round, especially for you Bob!
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable: I propose a 60/40 split. Think carefully, the money will be worth less next round.
Bob, let's be realistic.  You're losing value every round.  I'll take $7,000, you take $3,000. This is a better deal than you'll see in later rounds.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly. Take it before inflation eats away at any potential gains for both of us.
